io.github.dddplus.specification

类 Notification

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.dddplus.specification.Notification

  • public class Notification
extends Object
    A notification is an object that collects reason why specifications not satisfied.

    google Notification Pattern & Specification Pattern for more details

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean addReason(String reason)
      Add a reason why this specification not satisfied.
      static Notification create()
      Create an empty Notification instance.
      String firstReason()
      Get the first unsatisfaction reason if any.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Returns true if this Notification contains no unsatisfaction reasons.
      List<String> reasons()
      Return the collected unsatisfaction reasons.
      int size()
      Returns the number of unsatisfaction reasons.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 方法详细资料

      • create

        public static Notification create()
        Create an empty Notification instance.

      • addReason

        public boolean addReason(String reason)
        Add a reason why this specification not satisfied.

        Will filter out duplicated reason under the hood.

        参数:
        reason - unsatisfaction reason. if null, will be ignored and return false
        返回:
        true if this Notification changed as a result of the call

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Returns true if this Notification contains no unsatisfaction reasons.

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the number of unsatisfaction reasons.

      • reasons

        public List<String> reasons()
        Return the collected unsatisfaction reasons.

      • firstReason

        public String firstReason()
        Get the first unsatisfaction reason if any.
        返回:
        null if empty
